mapper.insert: insert into labusing (labusing_id, labusing_date, labusing_dateend, course_id, laboratory_number) values (#{labusingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labusingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labusingDateend,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laboratoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select labusing_id, labusing_date, labusing_dateend, course_id, laboratory_number from labusing

select labusing_id, labusing_date, labusing_dateend, course_id, laboratory_number from labusing where labusing_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{strattime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and labusing_dateend DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select labusing_id, labusing_date, labusing_dateend, course_id, laboratory_number from labusing where course_id = #{courseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATE_FORMAT(labusing_dateend,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') > DATE_FORMAT(#{starttime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(labusing_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
